newsitem.title: FRANCE: PARIS BOURSE RESUMES TRADE, UP SLIGHTLY.
newsitem.headline: PARIS BOURSE RESUMES TRADE, UP SLIGHTLY.

text.p: French shares were up slightly on Monday afternoon after the resumption of trading, which was interrupted for around 20 minutes by technical problems.

* CAC-40 index up 3.29, or 0.12 percent, at 2,801.58 at 1436 GMT. Index off all-time high of 2,825.18 points as investors took profits on news of an EMU stability pact deal struck by European leaders in Amsterdam.
* CAC-40 Jun futures 2,791 vs 2,793 at Fridays close
